title: Legal AI startup Eve for plaintiffs' lawyers hits $1 billion valuation with new funding
description: Eve, a San Francisco-based startup that makes artificial intelligence tools for plaintiffs' law firms, said on Tuesday that it has raised $103 million at a $1 billion valuation.
content:
Sept 30 (Reuters) - Eve, a San Francisco-based startup that makes artificial intelligence tools for plaintiffs' law firms, said on Tuesday that it has raised $103 million at a $1 billion valuation.

title: Meta Is Said to Acquire Chips Startup Rivos to Push AI Effort
description: Meta Platforms Inc. is acquiring chips startup Rivos Inc., according to a person familiar with the deal, part of an effort to bolster its internal semiconductor development and control more of its infrastructure for artificial intelligence work.
content:

title: Doctors and nurses are better than AI at triaging patients, research indicates
description: Doctors and nurses are better at triaging patients in emergency departments than artificial intelligence (AI), according to research presented at the European Emergency Medicine Congress.
content:
Doctors and nurses are better at triaging patients in emergency departments than artificial intelligence (AI), according to research presented at the European Emergency Medicine Congress.

title: Why you can’t miss the aerospace content at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
description: At TechCrunch Disrupt, the Aerospace Corporation is pulling back the curtain on how artificial intelligence is reshaping the space economy — through bold startups and cutting-edge research.
content: When people think about space, the first images that come to mind are usually rockets, satellites, and astronauts floating in orbit. But the future of space is just as much about algorithms and compute power as it is about propulsion systems and spac... [2493 chars]

title: Tata Motors to infuse additional Rs 120 crores in Freight Tiger
description: Tata Motors announced a further investment of Rs 120 crore in Freight Commerce Solutions. This brings its total commitment to Freight Tiger to Rs 270 crore. The company aims to transform logistics using artificial intelligence. Tata Motors also established a new subsidiary in the Netherlands. This entity will manage business interests.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Innovation Takes Center Stage at IIFT's 15th Indian Management Conclave
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Alphabet’s AI Strength Fuels Biggest Quarterly Jump Since 2005
description: Alphabet Inc. shares are on track for their biggest quarterly gain in 20 years, the latest reflection of how investors are turning more positive on the Google parent as it strengthens its foothold in artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Huawei ramps up AI chip production to fill in Nvidia's falling market share in China: report
description: China-based Huawei plans to nearly double the production of its artificial intelligence chip, the 910C, in 2026 as it attempts to fill in the gaps left in the wake of Nvidia's (NVDA) dwindling shipments to the country, according to Bloomberg.
